messages.message: Ithelp is asking for a specific role set, Could you help specify which one is it? @Gauti
In https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IT/pages/1894940673/AWS+Access+Groups#Instabase-dev---549230430157, There are multiple role access groups

Also, if the ecr-login script fails for anyone, run this command directly in your shell `aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-2 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com (http://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com)`
@anik.b, You need `aws-dev-powerUserAccess` role to get the `PowerUserAccess` .

After updating `AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID` and `AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY` in `ibdev-backend/scripts/ecr-login` and running `.scripts/ecr-login`

I am seeing

```An error occurred (UnrecognizedClientException) when calling the GetAuthorizationToken operation: The security token included in the request is invalid.
Error: Cannot perform an interactive login from a non TTY device```

and when I run ``aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-2 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com (http://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com)`

I see the same thing
You need to add AWS session token as well.
It doesn't seem like I have anything in my .sandbox folder except setup - what do I need to do from here to even get to the starting point for these steps?

@Abhinav and @jayapandian.ponraj the IT team is getting a lot of tickets requesting powerUser on instabase-dev to perform this workaround^

Would you like to individually approve these, should we grant access temporarily and revoke once the workaround has been performed, or reject all requests for this and wait for a fix? Thanks!
Lets grant power user access to all devs

Most of our Crafting users are in Eng, but there are a few additional users from Customer Engineering, for example. One of our IT tickets requesting this came from Jet Zhuang in CE. Are we okay to grant powerUser to them as well if they request it specifically for this workaround?

@samantha.pettley could you please share a list of powerusers in dev directly with me? Temporarily we can have powerusers however we need to keep this list to small in the long run.

Thank you.
@Weiming Wu the this is the full path: `/home/owner/instabase/.sandbox/ibdev-backend/scripts/ecr-login`
